```{r ConcvTime, echo=FALSE,fig.show='hide',warning=FALSE}

        

### Name: ConcvTime

### Aliases: ConcvTime

### ** Examples

data("twoCmt")
ConcvTime(datFile = twoCmt,ID = '1',ipredVar = 'IPRED')
ConcvTime(datFile = twoCmt,ID = '1',ipredVar = 'IPRED',minorTicks = T)



        


```
```{r}
picList=list.files(fig.dir,pattern = 'ConcvTime-',full.names = T)
lp=length(picList)
 if(lp==1){
slickR(picList,slideId = 'ConcvTime',width='100%',height='400px',slickOpts=list(dots=T))
 }else{
 slickR( rep(picList,2),
        slideId = c('ConcvTime-up','ConcvTime-down'),
                slideIdx = list(1:lp,(lp+1):(2*lp)),
                slideType=rep('img',2),
                synchSlides = c('ConcvTime-up','ConcvTime-down'),
                slickOpts = list(list(slidesToShow=1,slidesToScroll=1),
                list(dots=T,slidesToScroll=1,slidesToShow=lp,centerMode=T,focusOnSelect=T)
                ),height=400,width='100%')
}

```
